Title: Creates the New York state home ownership savings plan and creating a property tax exemption related thereto
Summary: Creates the New York state home ownership savings plan; creates a property tax exemption related thereto; creates exemptions for properties purchased in target areas with a New York state home ownership savings plan.
LawCode: Add ยง97-n, St Fin L; add ยง421-r, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the real property tax law, in relation to creating the New York state home ownership savings plan and creating a property tax exemption relating thereto
